Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.guardtime.ksi.tlv.GlobalTlvTypes.ELEMENT_TYPE_AGGREGATION_PDU_V1
    com.guardtime.ksi.tlv.GlobalTlvTypes.ELEMENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_PDU_V1
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.VerificationContextBuilder.createVerificationContext()
    com.guardtime.ksi.Signer.getAggregatorConfiguration()
    Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSISigningService.getAggregationConfiguration() in pair with KSISigningService.registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. To acquire instance of KSISigningService which a KSI instance uses, call Signer.getSigningService().
    com.guardtime.ksi.Extender.getExtenderConfiguration()
    Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSIExtendingService.getExtendingConfiguration() in pair with KSIExtendingService.registerExtenderConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. To acquire the KSIExtendingService which a KSI instance uses, call Extender.getExtendingService().
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSignerBuilder.setDefaultHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder.setTreeBuilder(TreeBuilder) instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.VerificationContext.setPduFactory(PduFactory)
    Deprecated since 4.10. Has no effect since PduFactory is defined in the KSIExtendingService level.
    com.guardtime.ksi.KSIBuilder.setPduIdentifierProvider(PduIdentifierProvider)
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSignerBuilder.setPduIdentifierProvider(PduIdentifierProvider)
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSignerBuilder.setPduVersion(PduVersion)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory.InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory(Policy, PublicationsFileClientAdapter, KSIExtenderClient, boolean, KSISignatureComponentFactory)
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory.InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory(Policy, PublicationsFileClientAdapter, KSIExtenderClient, boolean, PduFactory, KSISignatureComponentFactory)
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory.InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory(Policy, PublicationsFileClientAdapter, KSIExtendingService, boolean, KSISignatureComponentFactory)
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningClient)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningClient, HashAlgorithm)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningClient, KSISignatureFactory, HashAlgorithm)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningService)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningService, HashAlgorithm)
    Use KsiBlockSignerBuilder instead.
    com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSigner(KSISigningService, KSISignatureFactory, HashAlgorithm)
    com.guardtime.ksi.service.tcp.TCPClient(TCPClientSettings)
    Use SigningTCPClient(TCPClientSettings) or TCPClient(TCPClientSettings, TCPClientSettings) instead. WARNING! Using this constructor only configures the aggregator connection and the extending will not be usable.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.VerificationErrorCode.KEY_01
